DOC.brief_summary: Patients who have completed the 12 weeks treatment of the PATENT-1 trial (study number 12934) will be asked to participate in this long term extension study with BAY63-2521.
DOC.brief_title: BAY63-2521:Long-term Extension Study in Patients With Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Patients who have completed 12 weeks of treatment in the double blind trial PATENT 1 Patients who have an ongoing serious adverse event from PATENT 1 that is assessed as related to BAY632521 are not allowed to participate in the extension trial.
